modName: NHCS - No Hassle Class System BETA
summary: A no hassle higly compatible class system.
descriptionHtml:
WARNING!!- This class system requiers Elys\' community uncaper. This is just a modefied .ini file so you must have the community uncapper instaled in order for these classes to work. You must also start a new character.
Download community uncapper from here - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1175

CONCEPT
This is a community uncapper .ini tweek that tries to rectefy the leveling system from Skyrim. 

You will have class specific skills that you will be able to level up higher than none class skills. for example, the sowrd and board warrior will be able to level up his block to skill level 100 but his sneak will only go up to 25.

The player will be able to level up to lv 81 even with less skills reaching 100 levels. Skills will level a lot slower than in vanila though to compencate. The player will level skills at an even slower rate past character level 40. Skills will contribute to player level at a normal rate up to character level 40. After level 40, skills will contribute to player level at an extreamly fast rate compared to vanila. 

I am curently planing various other classes. You can specialize the warrior or the upcoming rogue to be archers during the game. No tweeking necesary.

INSTALATION
Use NMM and click on the green \"download with manager\" button. Go to skyrim\\Data\\SKSE\\Plugins and you should find a new folder named \"classes\" go inside the folder, pick a class, copy the .ini file, go back to the plugins folder and paste. You will have to do this every time you play a different character with a different class.

PLANNED CLASSES 
Rogue illusionist 
Destruction mage (released but untested)
Summoner 
Paladin 
Rogue 
Cleric (2 styles, armor wearing and cloth wearing) 
Barbarian (released but untested)
 
CURRENT CLASSES 
Warrior - Sword n board
Warrior - 2handed
Barbarian (untested)
Destruction mage (untested)
 
WARNING!!!! 
This is only a beta. The skill progression is supposed to work well in theory, but I might have not taken some variables into consideration. play at your own risk. 
players should know that because there will be less skills, the skills will level up a lot slower than in vanilla. this is not a bug. 
 
HONORABLE MENTIONS 
Elys for making the most awesome community uncapper. 
Ravage for helping me with some of the math and for helping me with writing the mod description 
Bethesda for making a great game and letting us mod the **** out of it :)

PATCH NOTES

0.51- Added three new classes. Barbarian, Warrior - 2handed and destruction mage.  
0.5-   first release with class \"Warrior - Sword n board\"
